author: James Joyce
text: In your letter received last night the no of copies sold is 499. In the A/S sent me six months ago, to date 31 Dec 1914, the no was also 499. Is the last A/S dated as it should be 30 June: and does this mean that in the six months, 31 Decâ€“30 June, no copy was sold? Sincerely yours James Joyce P.S. I note that Mr Pound has the typescript of Exiles. The article in New Age is in issue of 25 February 1915.
